languages.text: Охваченные бунтом палубы — не самое безопасное место в галактике. Оружие, предложенное сенешалем Абеляром Версерианом, лучше держать под рукой.

traits.locale_text: Охваченные бунтом палубы — не самое безопасное место в галактике. Оружие, предложенное сенешалем Абеляром Версерианом, лучше держать под рукой.

languages.text: There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.
languages.original_text: Охваченные бунтом палубы — не самое безопасное место в галактике. Оружие, предложенное сенешалем Абеляром Версерианом, лучше держать под рукой.

traits.locale_text: Decks during the revolt aren't the safest place in the galaxy. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.
There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.
There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.

languages.text: Es gibt nur wenige Ort in der Galaxie, die gefährlicher sind als offene Raumschiffdecks während einer Revolte. Die von Truchsess Abelard Werserian angebotene Waffe sollte stets griffbereit sein.
languages.original_text: There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.

traits.locale_text: Es gibt nur wenige Ort in der Galaxie, die gefährlicher sind als offene Raumschiffdecks während einer Revolte. Die von Truchsess Abelard Werserian angebotene Waffe sollte stets griffbereit sein.

languages.text: Rares sont les endroits dans la galaxie plus dangereux que les ponts ouverts d'un vaisseau en pleine révolte. Mieux vaut garder l'arme offerte par le sénéchal Abélard Werserian à portée de main.
languages.original_text: There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.

traits.locale_text: Rares sont les endroits dans la galaxie plus dangereux que les ponts ouverts d'un vaisseau en pleine révolte. Mieux vaut garder l'arme offerte par le sénéchal Abélard Werserian à portée de main.

languages.text: 在整个银河系中，没有哪里比暴乱状态下的虚空舰甲板更危险。你应该随身带好阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领提供的武器。
languages.original_text: There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.

traits.locale_text: 在整个银河系中，没有哪里比暴乱状态下的虚空舰甲板更危险。你应该随身带好阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领提供的武器。

languages.text: 銀河系で反乱時のヴォイドシップのデッキほど危険な場所はない。家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンから提供された武器は手近に置いておくべきだ。
languages.original_text: There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.

traits.locale_text: 銀河系で反乱時のヴォイドシップのデッキほど危険な場所はない。家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンから提供された武器は手近に置いておくべきだ。

languages.text: Hay pocos lugares más peligrosos en la galaxia que una cubierta de nave del vacío durante un motín. El arma ofrecida por el Senescal Abelard Werserian es algo que resultará útil.
languages.original_text: There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.

traits.locale_text: Hay pocos lugares más peligrosos en la galaxia que una cubierta de nave del vacío durante un motín. El arma ofrecida por el Senescal Abelard Werserian es algo que resultará útil.

languages.text: Galakside, isyana sahne olan, açıktaki uçsuz gemisi güvertelerinden daha tehlikeli çok az yer vardır. Seneşal Abelard Werserian'ın verdiği silahın el altında tutulması iyi olur.
languages.original_text: There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.

traits.locale_text: Galakside, isyana sahne olan, açıktaki uçsuz gemisi güvertelerinden daha tehlikeli çok az yer vardır. Seneşal Abelard Werserian'ın verdiği silahın el altında tutulması iyi olur.
